Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP50
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP50.Model.GodsList

Class God

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP50.Model.GodsList.God
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Demeter, Hephaestus, Minotaur, Pan, Prometheus
public abstract class God
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
God is an abstract class that will be inherited by every God card
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Details

    • availableSteps

      protected final java.util.ArrayList<Phase> availableSteps
      A list of the different steps which compose the turn of play. The turn is different for every God so the list will be empty by default, and changed in every constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • God

      protected God​(GodsNames name)
      *Constructor*
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the God

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableSteps

      public java.util.ArrayList<Phase> getAvailableSteps()
      Gives a list of the different steps which compose the turn of play. Steps can be: Move, Build, Optional Move, Optional Build
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Phase objects, that are the available steps

    • getName

      public GodsNames getName()
      Returns:
      the name of the God

    • getAvailableMove

      public java.util.ArrayList<Space> getAvailableMove​(Player player)
      Gets the available spaces where the player can perform a "Move" action through this God card. Basic implementation is provided, Gods that have a different logic will override this method.
      Parameters:
      player - The owner of the God card
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of the allowed spaces where his worker can move

    • getAvailableBuild

      public java.util.ArrayList<Space> getAvailableBuild​(Player player)
      Gets the available spaces where the player can perform a "Build" action through this God card. Basic implementation is provided, Gods that have a different logic will override this method.
      Parameters:
      player - The owner of the God card
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of the allowed spaces where his worker can build

    • getOptionalMove

      public java.util.ArrayList<Space> getOptionalMove​(Player player)
      Gets the available spaces where the player can perform an "Optional Move" action through this God card. Basic implementation returns an empty list because not every God card has an Optional Move action, so it makes no sense to declare it abstract and implement it in every God. Gods that have a different logic will override this method.
      Parameters:
      player - The owner of the God card
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of the allowed spaces where his worker can move

    • getOptionalBuild

      public java.util.ArrayList<Space> getOptionalBuild​(Player player)
      Gets the available spaces where the player can perform an "Optional Build" action through this God card. Basic implementation returns an empty list because not every God card has an Optional Build action, so it makes no sense to declare it abstract and implement it in every God. Gods that have a different logic will override this method.
      Parameters:
      player - The owner of the God card
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of the allowed spaces where his worker can build

    • getAvailableBlock

      public java.util.ArrayList<Block> getAvailableBlock​(Player player)
      Gets the available blocks that the player can choose during a "Build/Optional Build" action. Default implementation returns a one-element list. Gods that have a different logic will override this method.
      Parameters:
      player - The owner of the God card
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of the allowed blocks that can be chosen to build

    • move

      public boolean move​(Player player, Space space)
      Moves the selected worker of the player and makes sure every parameter is set correctly.
      Parameters:
      player - The owner of the God card
      space - a Space variable that indicates where to move
      Returns:
      a boolean variable to report the outcome of the action

    • build

      public boolean build​(Player player, Space space, Block piece)
      Build the correct block with the selected worker of the player and makes sure every parameter is set correctly.
      Parameters:
      player - The owner of the God card
      space - a Space variable that indicates where to build
      piece - The selected block to build
      Returns:
      a boolean variable to report the outcome of the action

    • getWinCondition

      public boolean getWinCondition​(Player player)
      Check if a player has won using the "win condition" of the player's god.
      Parameters:
      player - the owner of the God card
      Returns:
      a boolean variable that is true if the player won, false otherwise
